name: ehhg
description:
a short click-game made with sok-stories and the unofficial sok-stories embedding tool for Low Effort Jam 10

advance by clicking  animated elements and stop when you've reached the ~FIN~ screen.

custom non-sokpop audio was intended, but due to the mysteries of the engine the audio hack appears to only work on some devices (not mine, for instance). if no audio plays, I suggest downloading egg.mp3 below or watching this video.

unfortunately the game is not mobile-friendly, lacking a means to close the window when you've finished.
